title: ‘Wicked’ Director Jon Chu Teases Cynthia Erivo-Written Songs in Second Film & Britney Biopic | 2025 Golden Globes
description: ‘Wicked’ Director Jon Chu caught up with Billboard’s Tetris Kelly at the 2025 Golden Globes.
author: Ciara McVey
excerpt: ‘Wicked’ Director Jon Chu caught up with Billboard's Tetris Kelly at the 2025 Golden Globes.
text: Death Row Records Celebrates Its Revival, Boldy James Can’t Miss, Trae Tha Truth Rounds Up Superstars, And Other New Hip-Hop Releases 2 days ago
